headline: John Malone Just Left the Board--But Might Be More Powerful Than Ever
summary: Warner Bros. Discovery reboots its board as the media mogul shifts from boardroom to behind-the-scenes kingmaker.

headline: Dr. John C. Malone to Transition to Chair Emeritus of Warner Bros. Discovery Board
summary: Warner Bros. Discovery, Inc. (the "Company") (Nasdaq: WBD) today announced that Dr. John C. Malone has decided not to stand for re-election to the Company's Board of Directors and will be transitioning to the role of Chair Emeritus, effective upon the expiration of his term at the 2025 Annual Meeting of Stockholders ("Annual Meeting").

headline: Warner Bros Discovery says John Malone will not seek board re-election
summary: Cable TV pioneer John Malone is not seeking re-election to the board of Warner Bros Discovery and will instead take on the role of chairman emeritus, the media company said on Friday. ...
